name: Narbacular Drop
description:
Narbacular Drop is an action game developed by Nuclear Monkey Software. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Nuclear Monkey Software. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Narbacular Drop is available on PC.
It was produced by Kim Swift. It was directed by Jeep Barnett. Jeep Barnett and Joshua Billeaudeau scored the game.
